className.transform: const items = data[0] || []; const customClass = data[1] || ''; if (items.length === 0) return 'text-center text-muted-foreground py-8'; return customClass

children.transform: (items) => items && items.map((item, index) => ({ id: `list-item-${index}`, type: 'div', bindings: { className: { source: 'itemClassName', transform: 'data || ""' } }, children: [{ id: `list-item-content-${index}`, type: 'div', bindings: { children: { source: 'renderItem', transform: `(fn) => fn && fn(item, ${index})` } } }] }))
